descriptionHtml:
NOTE!! i have re-installed my PC so i could not finnish it, but i will update it soon! :D

The Blade of Dawn was lost for centuries, but now Dovahkiin has found it!

The sword got over 9,4K in damage, it is pretty much, but is is a god like sword, just looks like a normal katana, (it looks like a katan, because it is hidden in that form) in the book it says it got 117K damage it is wrong, i am so sorry for that mistake...
Book has been added in the Riverwood Sleeping Giants Inn

The blade is 1 of 7 blades! and it is located all across Skyrim, i will release 1 at the time.
after all 7 swords have been published, the location of the owner of the swords will be revield!

So, i think you will like it! i will also release a costom armor in the future called the Armor of Dawn!
What you will see in the next update: More updates on the house or a NEW sword! :D

Hope you like it, the sword is located in Riverwood near the chopped tree! :)
it might come some Patches for the sword, if you think it is to good :) i might changed it!


---UPDATES---
Version 1.4
-Added a new house
-Fixed some bugs...

Version 1.3
-Added a New Spell! (located in the Dawnstar Inn)
-Fixed some minor Bugs

Version 1.2
-Added a new version of The Blade of Dawn, it is located at the Sleeping Giants inn (In the Secret room). 
-The mod is now compatible to Dawnguard DLC!! :D

Version 1.1
-Added a new book in the Sleeping Giants inn.
author: VenuHD
